remarks: Properties that determine an Abelian group operation.  (Changed label from ~ isabld to ~ isablod -NM 6-Aug-2013.)  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Dec-2009.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isgrpda.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) $.
isgrpda.2 $e |- ( ph -> G : ( X X. X ) --> X ) $.
isgrpda.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X /\ z e. X ) ) -> ( ( x G y ) G z ) = ( x G ( y G z ) ) ) $.
isgrpda.4 $e |- ( ph -> U e. X ) $.
isgrpda.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> ( U G x ) = x ) $.
isabld.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> N e. X ) $.
isabld.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> ( N G x ) = U ) $.
isabld.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( x G y ) = ( y G x ) ) $.
isablod $p |- ( ph -> G e. AbelOp ) $.
$d G x y z $.
$d U x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
